bug.author: Dpothier
bug.summary: [BUG] val_accuracy as a monitor metric for Experiment class
bug.description: Describe the bug The Experiment class does not recognize "val_accuracy" as a valid value for monitor_metric, while the doc implies that both acc and accuracy should be supported. To Reproduce Instantiate an Experiment, passing "val_accuracy" as value for the monitor_metric parameter Expected behavior The Experiment should accept the value and track validation accuracy to determine the best model, as it does when the value "val_acc" is passed.

comments.comment: The monitor metric has to be a key in the log dictionnary passed to callbacks. Maybe we should specify that in the doc?
Hi, since version 1.0, I updated the documentation about metrics. Let me know if you think there are some things not clear. I will close this issue.
